resources.string: Set your heart ablaze, go beyond your limits!
Feel the rage, the powerful, pure rage of not being able to forgive will become your unswerving drive to take action.
Even if i lose my memories, my body will remember that anger that will not leave me until i die.
We are proud to live and die as human beings. Dont act like your worthless ideas are supreme and force them on others.
Being born with talent must be nice. I thought I was envious before, but Im so jealous right now. All I can think about is tearing you to shreds.
I want to die defeating Muzan, and I pray that it will purify my filthy blood.
My heart would never flutter for those who needlessly hurt others!
See more or less information about the hashiras.
